Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_xClassificationTree_name] ON [innovator].[XCLASSIFICATIONTREE] ( [NAME] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: IX_xclassificationtree_name
